content: I'm not really into fish or seafood. Nothing beats a nice bowl of meat stew.{短暂停} But seeing you with those shellfish tongs, I just had to say it.
info: 闲聊-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持赶海钳-0保底_新引入语

content: Bhan, are you gonna catch some crabs with those shellfish tongs?
